target: By 2020, enhance capacity-building support to developing countries, including for least developed countries and small island developing States, to increase significantly the availability of high-quality, timely and reliable data disaggregated by income, gender, age, race, ethnicity, migratory status, disability, Geographical location and other characteristics relevant in national contexts
title: Number of countries that have national statistical legislation that complies with the Fundamental Principles of Official Statistics
indicator_name: Number of countries that have national statistical legislation that complies with the Fundamental Principles of Official Statistics
goal_meta_link_text: United Nations Sustainable Development Goals Metadata (PDF 4.0 MB)
comments_limitations: Data follows the UN specification for this indicator. This indicator has not been identified in collaboration with topic experts.
